3.label: Invert/Disable LED
3.description: Adjusts when the indicator LED is turned ON, OFF, or disabled

6.label: Dim up/down rate
6.description: Adjusts when the indicator LED is turned ON, OFF, or disabled

options.label: (Default) Dim up/down the light to the specified level quickly by command except value 0 and FF
Dim up/down the light to the specified level slowly by command except value 0 and FF

7.label: Z-Wave Command Dim Step
7.description: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

8.label: Z-Wave Command Dim Rate
8.description: This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.

9.label: Local Control Dim Step
9.description: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

10.label: Local Control Dim Rate
10.description: This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.

11.label: ALL ON/ALL OFF Dim Step
11.description: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

12.label: ALL ON/ALL OFF Dim Rate
12.description: This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.

2.label: Supports Basic Set and is controlled with the local load

3.label: Supports Basic Set and is controlled by double pressing the On or Off button
